item.title: Milestone 0: The Site is (re)launched! (And a brief history)
item.description: I developed my first website way back in 2017, in a panic after I decided that I wasn’t going to find an internship without one. It was a horrendous thing, made up of cobbled together HTML and CSS that I got from a free Bootstrap template, but it was a webpage that displayed things, so I suppose it was good enough. I was eventually employed (although I don’t think my site had anything to do with getting me that job) and I promptly forgot about this site.

item.title: This Site!
item.description: The theme of this site was designed in Figma and written by hand. The blog itself is statically generated with Hugo. I’m not sure this site will ever be finished, so expect changes as time goes on. I will keep this project page updated as a changelog. Milestone 0
